title: Novatek 3Q Net Profit Soars on Arctic LNG Disposal Gains
text:
By Adria Calatayud

Novatek (NVTK.MZ) said Wednesday that net profit for the third quarter of 2019 soared as the company booked a large gain on the sale of interests in the Arctic liquefied-natural-gas 2 project.

The Russian oil-and-gas company made a net profit of 369.96 billion Russian rubles ($5.79 billion) for the three months to Sept. 30 compared with RUB45.90 billion in the year-earlier period. The company said disposals of a 10% and a 30% interests in the Arctic LNG 2 project in March and July amounted to RUB675.0 billion taken together.

Revenue for the quarter fell 14% to RUB189.16 billion from RUB219.37 billion a year earlier due to lower hydrocarbon prices, Novatek said. Production volumes increased due to the launch at the second and third LNG trains at the Yamal LNG project in Russia.

Write to Adria Calatayud at adria.calatayudvaello@dowjones.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 30, 2019 07:35 ET (11:35 GMT)
